abstract.para: This section describes information providers (TODO: glossary) used to gather information [either via execution aggregator sources (in the Aggregator Framework TODO add link) or via UsefulRP TODO add link].
If you have an information provider you would like to submit to the Globus Toolkit, download a folder with README instructions and template files here (currently available as a zip file).

appendix.title: Links to External Information Providers
appendix.para: The following are links that have been developed outside of the Globus Toolkit distribution.
